languages.text: {n}Опустив голову и надолго, словно обдумывая что-то, замолчав, Джай наконец глухо изрекает:{/n} "Хорошо. Я принимаю условие".
{n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."
languages.original_text: {n}Опустив голову и надолго, словно обдумывая что-то, замолчав, Джай наконец глухо изрекает:{/n} "Хорошо. Я принимаю условие".

traits.locale_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊垂下头，一言不发，似乎在思考着什么。过了很久，她以空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“好吧，我愿意接受你的条件。”
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊垂下头，一言不发，似乎在思考着什么。过了很久，她以空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“好吧，我愿意接受你的条件。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}項垂れてしばらく言葉を発しなかったジェイは、考え込んだ後、うつろな声でこう言った。{/n}「わかった、あんたの条件を受け入れるわ」
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}項垂れてしばらく言葉を発しなかったジェイは、考え込んだ後、うつろな声でこう言った。{/n}「わかった、あんたの条件を受け入れるわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras agachar la cabeza y guardar silencio durante un tiempo, meditando su decisión, declara con voz hueca:{/n} «De acuerdo. Acepto las condiciones».
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras agachar la cabeza y guardar silencio durante un tiempo, meditando su decisión, declara con voz hueca:{/n} «De acuerdo. Acepto las condiciones».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un long moment passé en silence et la tête inclinée, comme si elle réfléchissait, Jae déclare d'une voix creuse :{/n} « Très bien. J'accepte ces conditions. »
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un long moment passé en silence et la tête inclinée, comme si elle réfléchissait, Jae déclare d'une voix creuse :{/n} « Très bien. J'accepte ces conditions. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lässt den Kopf hängen und sagt lange Zeit nichts, als würde sie noch nachdenken. Dann erklärt sie mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Also gut. Ich akzeptiere Eure Bedingungen."
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lässt den Kopf hängen und sagt lange Zeit nichts, als würde sie noch nachdenken. Dann erklärt sie mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Also gut. Ich akzeptiere Eure Bedingungen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başını eğen ve durum değerlendirmesi yaparak uzunca bir süre bir şey söylemeyen Jae, sonunda ruhsuzca konuşuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Şartlarını kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}After hanging her head and saying nothing for a long time, as though thinking things over, Jae declares in a hollow voice,{/n} "All right. I accept your terms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Başını eğen ve durum değerlendirmesi yaparak uzunca bir süre bir şey söylemeyen Jae, sonunda ruhsuz bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Şartlarını kabul ediyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
